snippet: The Federal Reserve chairwoman cited progress on goals of maximum employment and price stability.
abstract: Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen says economy is ready for Fed to begin raising its benchmark interest rate in December.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve chairwoman cited progress on goals of maximum employment and price stability.

headline.main: Janet Yellen Says Economy Is Ripe for Fed Interest Rate Increase
headline.print_headline: Yellen Deems Economy Healthy Enough for Fed to Begin Raising Rates
